title: Household nutrition planning and execution
content:
Scenario: Household nutrition planning and execution
    Given Sarah plans meals for family nutritional needs
    And she manages Tommy's preferences, Emma's activities, budget constraints
    When Sarah performs nutrition work
    Then the household_elohim should track planning and execution separately
    And it should recognize nutritional knowledge as professional skill
    And it should value meal planning as complex decision-making
    And it should show the full scope: planning, shopping, prep, cooking, cleanup
    And nutrition work should be recognized as health care labor
    And Sarah's nutrition expertise should be valued professionally
